contest-event.event-date:
June 17, 1899 D Hardraw Scar Contest
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire 1st prize £15 and cup. 2nd prize 12. 3rd prize £8. 4th prize £5. 5th prize divided between Lindley and Wingates Temperance. Added by Satiche: Besses o' the Barns Band having won the 50 guinea Challenge Cup three years in succession, by the rules of the Society, it becomes their own property. Cornet Solo Competition: 1st , £2, John Ray, Lee Mount, Halifax; 2nd, £1, Wm. Pollard, Crawshawbooth, Rossendale, 3rd, 10s., W.M. Oughton, West Hartlepool. 15 bands competed
April 13, 2012, 10:13 p.m. July 28, 2019, 6:46 a.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen
